alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 2:59AM AKST until December 26 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN CONTINUE ACROSS THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE... Snowfall will continue through the morning hours across Skagway and Haines, with periods of freezing rain. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain expected. Additional snowfall accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, and minor ice accumulations. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph mainly on the Klondike Highway. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway, Haines Borough, and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation rates will diminish through the morning hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
